data.text: @nosunkcosts Interesting study highlighted in today's Bloomberg Prognosis newsletter and impact on brain, which may help explain vulnerability of current alzheimers and dementia patients https://t.co/41NHn5lo8Y

@nosunkcosts We saw a similar trend in summer 2021. Vax+boost+natural does seem to have an impact. 

While we aren't prepared to make a prediction, on our Q4 earnings call, we communicated that covid will likely be an unfavorable influence on global mortality for 5 yrs.

@nosunkcosts This info is directly from ONS which compares to the 2015-19 avg
https://t.co/lfo6igVj6Y https://t.co/8HL3zRDk4i
